sources.title: Scream Of Fear
sources.description: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.

sources.title: Scream Of Fear (1961)
sources.description: UM GRITO DE PAVOR ( Scream of Fear, 1961 - UK ) ( Filme Completo / Legendado em Português ) Data de Lançamento: 05 de Junho de 1961 » SOBRE O FILME: Depois de quase morrer afogada e receber ordens de seu médico, o Dr. Paul Gerrard, para que não se estressasse, pois poderia ficar louca, uma jovem paralítica retorna a sua casa após saber que seu pai havia desaparecido. Depois de chegar e estabelecer uma boa relação com sua madrasta, a tarefa de não estressar-se fica difícil quando a jovem vê o corpo de seu pai por toda a casa, mas não consegue chamar seus familiares antes que ele desapareça novamente. » » DIREÇÃO: Seth Holt GÊNERO: Suspense, Terror ORIGEM: UK DURAÇÃO: 81 minutos » » ELENCO PRINCIPAL:  Susan Strasberg: Penny Appleby  Ronald Lewis: Robert  Ann Todd: Jane Appleby  Christopher Lee: Doutor Pierre Gerrard  John Serret: Inspetor Legrand  Leonard Sachs: Dr. Spratt  Anne Blake: Marie  Fred Johnson: Pai

metadata.Plot: Penny Applebee's parents were divorced when she was quite young and she grew up with her mother. After her mother's death, the wheelchair-bound Penny has accepted her father's invitation to live with him. She arrives only to learn that her father is away though her stepmother - who she is meeting for the first time - proves to be quite welcoming. On her first night however, she sees a light in the summerhouse and upon investigation, sees her father sitting there, apparently dead. Others can find nothing there and tell her she must have imagined it. She later sees his body in library and then again in the pool. She comes to believe that her stepmother and her father's friend, Doctor Pierre Gerard, are plotting to drive her insane. She gets a sympathetic ear from Bob, the chauffeur, who feels there has to be some rational explanation for what has been happening.
metadata.Actors: Susan Strasberg, Ann Todd, Ronald Lewis
